properties.description: This Data Flow shows two ways to handle data without datetime information

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> OldInputData
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> InputData
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> InputData2
InputData, OldInputData exists(InputData@RecID == OldInputData@RecID && InputData@RecVersion == OldInputData@RecVersion,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> FilterNewAndUpdated
FilterNewAndUpdated alterRow(insertIf(FilterNewAndUpdated@VersionID == 1),
	updateIf(FilterNewAndUpdated@VersionID != 1)) ~> AlterRow
InputData2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ToDWHTruckAndInserts
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:[(NewAndUpdated@RecID)],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink2AzureSQLDB
